video.title: Uncle Grandpa
video.synopsis: This surreal cartoon series follows the adventures of Uncle Grandpa, who travels around the world with his wacky friends helping kids solve problems.

episodes.synopsis: When a kid is sad that his favorite shirt will not fit over his big belly, Uncle Grandpa shows him that fashions pass, but a big belly is always cool.
episodes.title: Belly Bros

episodes.synopsis: Uncle Grandpa accidentally unleashes a floating face that's so funny it can make you laugh yourself crazy. Will serious Gus agree to save the day?
episodes.title: Funny Face

episodes.synopsis: Uncle Grandpa mistakes a kid in a costume for an evil space emperor and sends him to another dimension, where he becomes an actual evil space emperor.
episodes.title: Space Emperor

episodes.synopsis: Uncle Grandpa needs his trusty Giant Realistic Flying Tiger, but she has vanished, sending him on a journey to find her and figure out why she left.
episodes.title: Tiger Trails

episodes.synopsis: When Uncle Grandpa and the gang are in a rush to purchase some emergency moustache cream, they face a formidable foe: Mart Mart.
episodes.title: Moustache Cream

episodes.synopsis: When a kid wants a cool nickname, Uncle Grandpa convinces him that he has to earn it in the most legendary way ever: yard work!
episodes.title: Nickname

episodes.synopsis: Uncle Grandpa convinces a girl who's afraid of the dark that there is nothing to fear but their own imaginations, which prove to be pretty terrifying.
episodes.title: Afraid of the Dark

episodes.synopsis: Uncle Grandpa tries to help a girl learn to drive, but when he accidentally shifts into the wrong gear, he sets a "crazy baby" loose in the city.
episodes.title: Driver's Test

episodes.synopsis: Gus and Pizza Steve have plans to go out for the night, but Uncle Grandpa cannot be left alone, so they turn to Uncle Grandpa to baby-sit himself.
episodes.title: Uncle Grandpa Sitter

episodes.synopsis: When Uncle Grandpa mistakenly eats a kid's Egyptian diorama, he helps the kid bring a real pyramid to school and unleashes an evil mummy on the world.
episodes.title: Uncle Grandpa Ate My Homework

episodes.synopsis: When Uncle Grandpa gets his head stuck in a peanut butter jar, Gus and Pizza Steve have to pretend to be Uncle Grandpa and help a kid.
episodes.title: Uncle Grandpa for a Day

episodes.synopsis: When Uncle Grandpa gets locked out of his RV and accidentally sets off the security system, he and his friends must disarm it before it destroys them.
episodes.title: Locked Out

episodes.synopsis: When Gus gets stuck in an embarrassingly supertight pair of shorts, he has to somehow get out of them in order to save his friends.
episodes.title: Jorts

episodes.synopsis: Uncle Grandpa and his crew anchor a news show; tortoises weigh in on what's cool; Uncle Grandpa goes nuts while trying to break into a piñata.
episodes.title: Shorts

episodes.synopsis: Uncle Grandpa and his friends eat at a restaurant but can't afford to pay the check, so they turn to a treasure map on the kids' menu for help.
episodes.title: Treasure Map

episodes.synopsis: Uncle Grandpa wants to help Adam win a video game via mind control, but he'll need help from the self-proclaimed master, Pizza Steve, to pull it off.
episodes.title: Brain Game

episodes.synopsis: When a friendly dog named Charlie Burgers loses his ball, Uncle Grandpa and the gang try to help the pup get his beloved toy back.
episodes.title: Charlie Burgers

episodes.synopsis: Uncle Grandpa and the gang travel to Japan to help a kid make a movie about a monster, casting Mr. Gus in the role of the fearsome creature.
episodes.title: Big in Japan

episodes.synopsis: A hapless boy who can't do anything right wishes he were perfect, so Uncle Grandpa solves the problem by turning him into a robot.
episodes.title: Perfect Kid

episodes.synopsis: On sleepover night in Uncle Grandpa's RV, the gang wants to get some shuteye but can't rest until they deal with a disturbing noise.
episodes.title: Mystery Noise

episodes.synopsis: When Uncle Grandpa and Pizza Steve engage in a prank war, Uncle Grandpa goes a bit too far, pulling a prank that could get Pizza Steve eaten.
episodes.title: Prank Wars

episodes.synopsis: Uncle Grandpa travels back through time and returns to warn Pizza Steve that he will do something awful in the next five minutes.
episodes.title: Future Pizza

episodes.synopsis: When Uncle Grandpa and Mr. Gus can't agree on which TV show to watch, the two have a wrestling match to decide the outcome.
episodes.title: Leg Wrestler

episodes.synopsis: Uncle Grandpa shows off his RV; Uncle Grandpa reads "Weird Man," his favorite comic; Pizza Steve recalls how he won an Italian karate competition.
episodes.title: More Uncle Grandpa Shorts

episodes.synopsis: Uncle Grandpa announces the winner of a contest to draw the gang's next adventure, but the lucky viewer who won doesn't want the prize.
episodes.title: Viewer Special

episodes.synopsis: When Uncle Grandpa wakes up on the wrong side of the bed, the rest of the gang goes to great lengths to turn his day around.
episodes.title: Bad Morning
